definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Products are mainly Gas Water Heaters and Gas Cookers.
sentences.chinese: 产品主要包括燃气快速热水器和燃气灶具。

sentences.english: The stoves are designed to have a lifetime of up to three years at a cost of about fifteen dollars.
sentences.chinese: 这个灶具的最常使用年限为3年，造价约15美元。

sentences.english: Examine the airproof of the connection between filter and the stove.
sentences.chinese: 检查净化器与灶具之间连接的气密性。

sentences.english: Kitchen stove oven with integrated cooktop can in western cooking.
sentences.chinese: 厨房内有炉灶烤箱一体的灶具，能烹制中西餐。

sentences.english: Embedded kitchen has the price tallish , every price is in commonly 500 yuan of above.
sentences.chinese: 嵌入式灶具价格稍高，每个售价一般在500元以上。

sentences.english: The room installed with stoves should have powerful ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 安装灶具的房间必须安装强力换气扇。

sentences.english: This company specialized management kitchen utensil, environmental protection cookware.
sentences.chinese: 本公司专业经营厨房用具，环保灶具。

sentences.english: We have got variety gas cooker models and versions for your preference.
sentences.chinese: 我们有多种型号及款式的燃气灶具供您选择。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
